alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Butler County through 100 AM CDT... At 1229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Towanda, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Augusta, Towanda, Leon, Rosalia, El Dorado Airport, Beaumont, El Dorado Lake and El Dorado State Park. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 61 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Kansas.
